item.title: Universal Digital Signage: Installation Instructons
item.description: The Universal Digital Signage web application provides a centralized digital signage solution. Images can be uploaded to the server and playlists created online. Playlists can be assigned to individual digital signs (hosts) or signs can be managed in groups. Playlist changes can be performed on a schedule (daily, weekly, or monthly schedules) with an option to add an interrupt schedule change (a temporary change set for a given period of time after which the sign or group reverts back to its normal schedule). There is also the option to assign playlists to channels to provide slideshows for other use cases (such as screensavers, external groups, or anythng where a slideshow is needed), interactive kiosks, and hosted online presentations.
